Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
VICTOR STEINER-DAVION CONQUERS TIKONOV!


Tikonov, Federated Commonwealth:  Prince Victor Steiner-Davion, leading reinforcements in the form Tenth Lyran Guards and Comstar 244th Division, have taken Tikonov for the Allied cause.  The elite Tenth Lyran forced the surrender of the Loyalist Third Republican, while the battle for Tikograd itself saw the destruction of the Valexa CMM.  After these setbacks, the remaining Loyalist formations, First Republican and Fifteenth Deneb Light Cavalry, have as previously retreated to Marlette.

Current, Prince Victor is reportedly engaged in one last major strategy session with his principal commanders, planning the last strokes of the Civil War.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
FIGHTING URUKHAI ATTACK TAURUS!


Taurus, Taurian Concordat: Taking revenge for the destruction of two Fighting Urukhai dropships in April, the remainder of the Fighting Urukhai have attacked Taurus!  Slipping into merchant traffic, once on-planet they have flew into a mad rage, targeting the capital city-every person, every building and especially the Taurian Guard-for destruction.  While the element of surprise and the Urukhai's rage has taken them deep into the capital, destroying many of the defenders and entire city blocks, the Taurian Guard are already rallying to defend the planet.
